title: Platform screen door fault causing delays

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Normal train service has resumed from #AngMoKio to #Braddell towards #MarinaSouthPier.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to a platform screen door fault at #Bishan, trains will be travelling at a slower speed from #AngMoKio to #Braddell towards #MarinaSouthPier.
[NSL]: Due to a platform screen door fault, pls add 5mins train travel time from #AngMoKio to #Braddell towards #MarinaSouthPier.
[NSL]: Due to a platform screen door fault, pls add 10mins train travel time from #AngMoKio to #Braddell towards #MarinaSouthPier.
